message:
http://bdinn.com/news/shibir-president-held-in-city/
Dhaka: Plainclothes police arrested Delwar Hossain, president of central Islami Chhatra Shibir, from the city’s Shyamoli area on Sunday afternoon.
A team of Detective Branch (DB) of police arrested Delwar from the house of one his relatives around 4 pm, said DB sources.
